description: Enter the total amount you think you'll need.

expandableSection.title: What price should I enter?
expandableSection.innerComponent: You can change the list price if you’ve agreed a different rate with the supplier.

expandableSection.title: What quantity should I enter?
expandableSection.innerComponent: Enter the total amount you think you'll need for the entire duration of the order.

expandableSection.title: What price should I enter?
expandableSection.innerComponent: You can change the list price if you've agreed a different rate with the supplier.

expandableSection.title: What quantity should I enter?
expandableSection.innerComponent: Enter the total amount you think you'll need for the entire duration of the order.

expandableSection.title: What date should I enter?
expandableSection.innerComponent:
Enter the planned delivery date you've agreed with the supplier. This is the day that each of the listed Service Recipients will start using this Catalogue Solution.

We've included the commencement date for this Call-off Agreement, but you can change it if you’ve agreed a different delivery date.

errorMessages.PriceMoreThan3dp: Price must be to a maximum of 3 decimal places
errorMessages.PriceLessThanMax: Maximum price exceeded, enter a lower price
errorMessages.PriceGreaterThanListPrice: You’ve entered a price that is more than the list price, enter a lower price
errorMessages.QuantityInvalid: Quantity must be a whole number
errorMessages.QuantityGreaterThanZero: Quantity must be greater than zero
errorMessages.QuantityLessThanMax: Maximum quantity exceeded, enter a lower quantity
errorMessages.DeliveryDateInvalid: Enter a planned delivery date in a valid format
errorMessages.DeliveryDateOutsideDeliveryWindow: Planned delivery date must be within 42 months from the commencement date for this Call-off Agreement
errorMessages.DeliveryDateNotReal: Planned delivery date must be a real date
errorMessages.DeliveryDateDayRequired: Planned delivery date must include a day
errorMessages.DeliveryDateMonthRequired: Planned delivery date must include a month
errorMessages.DeliveryDateYearRequired: Planned delivery date must include a year
errorMessages.DeliveryDateYearLength: Year must be four numbers, for example 2020
